text: Ion Chicu (born 28 February 1972) is a Moldovan politician. He was the Prime Minister of Moldova from 14 November 2019 until 31 December 2020. He became Prime Minister after Maia Sandu was forced out of office in a motion of no confidence by the Parliament of Moldova. Chicu resigned as Prime Minister in 23 December 2020 because of the protests in Moldova demanding early parliamentary elections. ==References== Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:Prime ministers of Moldova
title: Ion Chicu
